casebody.data:
Sidney Charles SMITH, Appellant, v. F. G. ZERBST, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 8538. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 12, 1937. Sidney Chas. Smith, in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., and Harvey H. Tisinger and H. T. Nichols, Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before FOSTER, SIBLEY, and HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
